name: SAPT-ZOMBIE SURVIVAL
description:
WELCOME TO SAPT!!!!!

A MMORPG HORROR ZOMBIE SURVIVAL GAME WHERE YOU MUST SURVIVE THE ZOMBIES THAT CAME FROM A DOOR CONNECTING THE EARTH AND THE HELL!!

STORY

ONCE A GROUP OF SCIENTEST WHERE TESTING FOR DIFFERENT UNIVERSE UNTIL THEY CAME ACROSS A CREATURE HIDDEN IN THE DARK OF CAVES!!!!

THEY INSTANTLY TOOK THE BLOOD OF CREATURE AND POURED IR INTO A SOLUTION THAT ONCE CAME FROM A FRUIT DROPPED FROM A TREE!!!

ONCE THE GATE OPENED AND THEY TRIED TO ENTER...THEY COULD NOT! THEY WHERE PASSING THROUGH IT AND THEN SUDDENLY BOOOOOOM!!!

ONE DAY SOME CREATURES STARTED ENTERING THE EARTH COMING FROM THE HELL!!!!!

SCIENTESTS WHERE ABLE TO STOP SOME CREATURES LIKE ALMOST 99% OF THEM TO STOP COMING BY LOWERING THE PORTAL SIZE BUT STILL A DEADLY WIGLY CREATURE OR I SHOULD SAY THOUSANDS OF CREATURES STARTING ZOMING...THEY WERE ZOMBIES!!!! !!!

YOUR TASK

KILL ALL THE ZOMBIES COMMING FROM THE PORTAL TO SURVIVE!!

FEATURE

1> 2 MAPS!!!!

2> AMAZING GRAPHICS

3> HORROR ATMOSPHERE

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

1> ATLEAST 2 GIGS OF RAM

2> ATLEAST 1 GB FREE SPACE

3> A PERSON WHO DOES NOT GET EASILY SCARED!(LOL)

THANKS FOR PLAYING ENJOY!!!!

mobile version played in browser is coming soon!!
